metadata.title: CVE-2019-5885 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Matrix Synapse before 0.34.0.1, when the macaroon_secret_key authenticationparameter is not set, uses a predictable value to derive a secret key andother secrets which could allow remote attackers to impersonate users.

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
